main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:SnakeStance} which gives him a passive {status:Breath} generation per turn and gives him additional {status:Breath} Potency generation when using skills against enemies with {status:Burst}.
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him 1 {status:Breath} Count whenever he triggers {status:Burst} (1 per turn).
S2 consumes 10 {status:Breath} Potency to give him a Coin reuse at 30+ Potency.
S3 gains additional crit damage if he has {status:SnakeStance}.
other: {status:SnakeStance} gives him additional {status:Burst} application on his S1 and Coin Power on his S3. His S2's final coin also lets him generate an extra stack of the buff on crit.

Both his S2 and S3 inflict {status:BurstPoison} which applies {status:AttackDown} and {status:DefenseDown} on the enemy whenever their {status:Burst} stack is triggered by a crit up to 5 times. When the debuff is fully consumed, it deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on the enemy's {status:Burst} Potency. His S3 consumes stacks of it before applying it again, fully consuming it if it crits and only partially consuming it otherwise.

His passive increases his damage dealt based on his {status:SnakeStance} when his target has {status:BurstPoison} and gives him {status:PenetrateDamageUp} if he fully consumes their {status:BurstPoison}.

1121201.desc:
If the target has [BurstPoison], deal +5% damage for every [SnakeStance] on self (max 15%)
If this unit reduced the target's [BurstPoison] down to 0 Stack, gain 1 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn (max 2)
1121201.name: Heishou Mutation [Si]

1121221.desc: If this unit is killed in this Encounter: every turn, at Combat Start, apply 2 [Breath] to the Substituting Identity of the earliest Deployment order
1121221.name: Like a Serpent: Flexible, Elastic, and Unpredictable
